title: Magento Product Import Via CSV
snippet:
I need someone to take spreadsheets I have. They are product lists.

I have some custom columns (product fields) and categories. 

I need someone

1. Tell me if I need to create the custom fields and categories
2. Help me clean the spreadsheet and get it ready into a format Magento can use to import.
3. You will not get access to the server. I only need answers, directions and the finished csv.
4. I have images. Sometimes I have one image that pertains to multiple products. Like for instance I have one shirt in blue. But I have 4 products for it. A small, medium, large, xlarger for example

I think I set php.ini to max upload of 20mb. Tell me if this is going to work or I need to make it bigger.

Total products will be under 200,000.


I need this done asap 

I am running Magento on a LAMP stack. Latest Magento.
